formula: a(n) ~ (2*n-1)! / r^(2*n), where r = 0.772419882704426062944736631601064953563... is the root of the equation arctanh(r)*tan(r) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 26 2014
Prepended missing a(0)=0 from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015
